short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds sentiments indicator to facebook posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Social Sentiments tells you how much of the Facebook posts you consume are positive and negative. It adds a small indicator for this. You also get detailed analytics about your positive/negative consumption online.
